prompt.content: Based on GOOGL's 10-Qs, calculate the company's Q2-FY2025 FCF Conversion of Adjusted EBITDA. Define FCF as OCF - Capex. Adjust EBITDA by adding back SBC expense. Express your answer as a percentage, rounded to two decimal places.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Identify Income from operations Q2 = $31,271 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Identify H2 OFC = $63,897 million","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Identify H2 Purchases of property and equipment = $39,643 million"},{"criteria":"Identify H2 Depreciation of property and equipment = $9,485 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Identify H2 Stock-based compensation expense = $11,514 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Identify Q1 OFC = $36,150 million","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Identify Q1 Purchases of property and equipment = $17,197 million"},{"criteria":"Identify Q1 Depreciation of property and equipment = $4,487 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Identify Q1 Stock-based compensation expense = $5,516 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"OCF Q2 computed as 63,897 − 36,150 = $27,747 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Capex Q2 computed as 39,643 − 17,197 = $22,446 million","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"FCF Q2 computed as 27,747 − 22,446 = $5,301 million"},{"criteria":"DPE Q2 computed as 9,485 − 4,487 = $4,998 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"EBITDA Q2 computed as Income from operations Q2 + DPE Q2 = 31,271 + 4,998 = $36,269 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"SBC Q2 computed as 11,514 − 5,516 = $5,998 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Adjusted EBITDA Q2 computed as 36,269 + 5,998 = $42,267 million","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"FCF Conversion computed as 5,301 ÷ 42,267 = 12.54%","operator":"correctness"}]
